backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles and blog CRUD with access control and author/admin permissions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to source files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing all major frontend files, components, pages, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme defining color tokens, dark mode values, and global background/foreground variables.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with SEO-friendly title and favicon links for multiple icon sizes.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots configuration allowing most pages while blocking profile and blog editor, and linking the sitemap.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: Static sitemap listing key public routes with change frequency and priority values.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React root router configuration defining all routes and rendering layout with header, footer, and theming.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Internet Identity login/logout button handling auth state, errors, and query cache clearing.
Logo component rendering the uploaded Marco Marketing image with size variants for header and footer.
frontend/src/components/CtaButton.tsx: Wrapper around the Button component providing a large, bold call‑to‑action style.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Renders the site footer with brand info, navigation links, services, and contact/social links.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Provides a responsive site header with navigation, login, SEO audit CTA, and mobile menu handling.
frontend/src/components/resources/Extern: Displays categorized external tools and portfolio resources using cards with outbound links.
frontend/src/components/services/Pricing: Shows three SEO pricing packages with feature lists and links to a full pricing guide.
frontend/src/components/services/Service: Renders a grid of service cards with icons, descriptions, and optional detail links.
Maps service icon keys to Lucide icons and renders the appropriate icon component.
frontend/src/data/externalResources.ts: Defines a list of external tools and portfolio resources with metadata for display.
frontend/src/data/services.ts: Exports structured service definitions including titles, descriptions, icons, and optional links.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBlog.ts: Provides React Query hooks for CRUD operations on blog posts using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Provides React Query hooks to load and save the current user's profile via an actor API, including cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider managing AuthClient login, identity state, and related status flags.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes, including typography and layout defaults.
frontend/src/lib/markdown.tsx: Transforms basic Markdown syntax into styled HTML using regex and renders it via dangerouslySetInnerHTML.
frontend/src/lib/seo.tsx: React hook that updates document title, meta tags, canonical link, Open Graph, Twitter tags, and optional JSON-LD.
frontend/src/lib/slug.ts: Provides functions to generate URL slugs from text and validate slug format.
frontend/src/lib/structuredData.ts: Generates JSON-LD schemas for organization, website, blog posts, FAQs, and combined schema graphs.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with SEO metadata, structured data, and multiple content sections describing the company.
frontend/src/pages/BlogEditorPage.tsx: Provides a form to create or edit blog posts, handling slug generation, validation, and submission.
frontend/src/pages/BlogIndexPage.tsx: Displays a sorted list of blog posts with SEO metadata and navigation to create or view posts.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPostPage.tsx: Shows a single blog post with SEO schema, author tools, and delete functionality.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero content, service highlights, stats, and SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Allows authenticated users to view and update their profile information.
frontend/src/pages/services/LogoDesignSe: React page rendering the Logo Design Services content with SEO metadata, hero section, process steps, and CTA buttons.
frontend/src/pages/services/SeoServicesP: React page for SEO Services including SEO metadata, hero content, pricing, and FAQ accordion with structured data.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Presents detailed service offerings, pricing, and marketing resources with SEO metadata.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state file describing requirements, SEO strategy, design constraints, known issues, and image conversion tasks.
